import React,{useContext, useState}from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import CartContext from '../../context/CartContext' import './Header.css' import HeaderBottom from './HeaderBottom' import HeaderTop from './HeaderTop' function Header() { const [activeInput,setActiveInput] = useState('inputSearch') const handleActiveInput = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() activeInput === 'inputSearch' ? setActiveInput('inputSearch active-input-search') : setActiveInput('inputSearch') } const [toggle,setToggle] = useState('toggle-button') const [toggleLinks,setToggleLinks] = useState('navbar-links') const handleToggle = (e) =>{ toggle === 'toggle-button' ? setToggle('toggle-button toggle-bars') : setToggle('toggle-button') toggleLinks === 'navbar-links' ? setToggleLinks('navbar-links active-navbar') : setToggleLinks('navbar-links') } const {cartItemsLength} = useContext(CartContext) return (
{/*
    Home Authors About Us Contact Us connection
*/}
{/*
*/} {/* {cartItemsLength > 0 && ( {cartItemsLength} )} */}
) } export default Header
